p: As of August 29, 2018, there were 1,952 HA sequences of novel H7N9 AIVs in the two databases, of which 1,125 were derived from human and 827 from avian species. There were 1,918 NA sequences of novel H7N9 AIVs, of which 1,096 were derived from human and 822 from avian species. The main epidemic area of novel H7N9 is China.
